#include<stdio.h>
#define m 1000000007
int main()
{
    unsigned long long int prod;
    int t,n,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        prod=1;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int arr[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
            prod=(prod*(arr[i]%m))%m;
        }
        printf("%llu\n",prod);
    }
}
